ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ssshh, although that s being creative with game mechanics, some powers that be would call that exploiting 8) a little creativity never hurt anyone though ...
ygData.messageBody:
ssshh, although that's being creative with game mechanics, some powers that
be would call that exploiting 8)

a little creativity never hurt anyone though

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: May 30, 2001 3:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


There is another faction type quest and you dont have to zone, taking some
soup up to near the marshal but I forget both party's in the quest. It is a
very very short run though sometimes you can run fast enough the door on
the bank doesnt close before you have another bowl of soup. Although I did
train the girl a little closer to the bank door before I started doing the
quest.


Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 10:13 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest


Last I checked that quest, the NPC will only give the turnips to low level
characters. Do it early if you want the faction from it.

>actually, there's a quest you can do really quick with selo's or sow in
>rivervale (no zoning), the turnip delivery quest, I got a druid to 11 doing
>it on test server once, he was very very warmly when i stopped doing it.
>
>
>You have to get ungodly good faction with GuardiansoftheVale, which you can

>gain by killing Goblins, Mooto and Deathfist Orcs; and by turning belts in
>to Deputy Budo, and goblin warbeads in to Sheriff Roglio. My Halfling
